products.name: deploy-arch-ibm-code-engine
products.label: Code Engine
products.short_description: Supports provisioning and configuring IBM Code Engine for IBM Cloud.
products.long_description: This architecture supports creating IBM Code Engine with project, apps, domain mappings, secrets, config maps, and service bindings.

features.title: Create IBM Code Engine Project
features.description: Creates IBM Code Engine Project to group, manage and provide access for Code Engine entities such as applications, jobs, and builds.

features.title: Create IBM Code Engine Apps
features.description: Creates applications to serve HTTP requests or WebSockets as their communications protocol. The number of running instances of an app are automatically scaled up or down

features.title: Create IBM Code Engine Custom Domain Mappings
features.description: Creates mappings from your own custom domain to your code engine application within a project.

features.title: Create IBM Code Engine Secrets
features.description: Provides a method to include sensitive configuration information, such as passwords or SSH keys, to your deployment.

features.title: Create IBM Code Engine Config Maps
features.description: Provides a method to include non-sensitive data information to your deployment.

features.title: Create IBM Code Engine Service Bindings
features.description: Creates service bindings to provide application's access to IBM Cloud services.

architecture.descriptions: This architecture creates IBM Code Engine entities.

diagrams.description: This architecture creates IBM Code Engine entities.
